code: export class PUT{static async putWord(id,word){try{const resp=await fetch("http://itgirlschool.justmakeit.ru/api/words/".concat(id,"/update"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json;charset=utf-8"},body:JSON.stringify(word)});const data=await resp.json();return data;}catch(e){console.error(e);}}}export default PUT;
